name: slack-connectwise
description: A basic node.js based slash command for Slack for ConnectWise.

COMPANY_URL.description: Your ConnectWise Manage URL, or if hosted, the API URL

SLACK_SLASH_TOKEN.description: Token for the slash command from Slack

SLACK_TZ.description: Timezone for converting UTC dates.  Google moment js timezones for a list of valid zones.  Default is America/Los_Angeles

ENTRY_POINT.description: If hosted, change to the current hosted API entry point, e.g. v2016_2
